quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life is a succesion of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Helen Keller

quote: In life, there are no mistakes, only lessons.
author: Vic Johnson,  Day by Day with James Allen

quote: Live like there’s no tomorrow and learn as if your life depends on it
author: Omar Kiam

quote: we tend to steer our lives in the direction of the lessons we need to learn
author: Don Campbell

quote: I've grown up a lot, I'm on my own, and I've learned some valuable life lessons.
author: Zac Efron

quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
author: Hugh Prather

quote: While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.
author: Angela Schwindt

quote: The most important lesson that we're supposed to be learning right now is how completely lost we are without God. If we don't learn this lesson, then our lives are going to have zero meaning. (Stronger: Forty Days of Metal and Spirituality)
author: Brian "Head"Welch

quote: Life is full of change, honey. That's how we learn and grow. When we're born, the Good Lord gives each of us a Life book. Chapter by chapter, we live and learn.
author: Beth Hoffman,  Saving CeeCee Honeycutt

quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Earth teach me to forget myself as melted snow forgets its life. Earth teach me resignation as the leaves which die in the fall. Earth teach me courage as the tree which stands all alone. Earth teach me regeneration as the seed which rises in the spring.
author: William Alexander

quote: The two toughest lessons to learn In life are “LET GO” & “LETs GO..!
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!

quote: In school, you're taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you're given a test that teaches you a lesson.
author: Tom Bodett

quote: Four things to learn in life: To think clearly without hurry or confusion; To love everybody sincerely; To act in everything with the highest motives; To trust God unhesitatingly.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: J.M. Barrie,  The Little Minister

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Life-long learning is the modus of keeping your brain…your thoughts…your ideas…engaged in a quest for knowledge that enriches and expands the mind with a constant thirst for wisdom.
author: Wes Adamson,  Imagination By Moonlight: living life boldly and successfully

quote: Life is life. You choose to live it or you do not.
author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves

quote: All of life is a constant education.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt,  The Wisdom of Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Our knowledge of life is limited to death
author: Erich Maria Remarque,  All Quiet on the Western Front

quote: And I learned what is obvious to a child. That life is simply a collection of little lives, each lived one day at a time. That each day should be spent finding beauty in flowers and poetry and talking to animals. That a day spent with dreaming and sunsets and refreshing breezes cannot be bettered.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quote: God allows us to experience the low points of life in order to teach us lessons that we could learn in no other way.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Life is about cherishing memories, getting lost in moments of beauty, and enjoying profound joy and happiness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everyday of your life is a another lesson. If you learn the lesson well and apply it; whether positive or negative, you determine what happens in your tomorrow.
author: David Kofi Awusi

quote: Life is a gift, but living is a choice.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life can give everything to whoever tries to understand and is willing to receive new knowledge.
author: Pramoedya Ananta Toer,  Bumi Manusia

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: I regret that it takes a life to learn how to live.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close

quote: Books. Cats. Life is Good.
author: Edward Gorey

quote: Life is a book waiting to happen.
author: Sloan McBride

quote: My mom, Irmelin, taught me the value of life. Her own life was saved by my grandmother during World War II.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: The home is the first and most effective place to learn the lessons of life: truth, honor, virtue, self control, the value of education, honest work, and the purpose and privilege of life. Nothing can take the place of home in rearing and teaching children, and no other success can compensate for failure in the home.
author: David O. McKay

quote: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
author: Socrates

quote: I know certain truths about life.
author: Dana Reinhardt,  How to Build a House

quote: Life, for the living, is a gift of opportunity; an exercise of the will to choose.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Live your life, no matter what that life is.
author: Corey Taylor,  Seven Deadly Sins: Settling the Argument Between Born Bad and Damaged Good

quote: All I have learned, I learned from books.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Life is a succession of moments, to live each one is to succeed.
author: Corita Kent

quote: life is a continous journey of transformation
author: Sukant Ratnakar,  Open the Windows

quote: There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Life is problems. Living is solving problems.
author: Raymond E. Feist,  Silverthorn

quote: A lesson for all of us is that for every loss, there is victory, for every sadness, there is joy, and when you think you’ve lost everything, there is hope.
author: Geraldine Solon,  The Assignment

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

quote: Live to learn to love. Learn to love to live. Love to live to learn so that you may live the life that you yearn.
author: Rico Dasheem

quote: Life is like a game of chess.To win you have to make a move.Knowing which move to make comes with IN-SIGHTand knowledge, and by learning the lessons that areacculated along the way.We become each and every piece within the game called life!
author: Allan Rufus,  The Master's Sacred Knowledge

quote: Life stand still here.
author: Virginia Woolf,  Mrs. Dalloway

quote: Life is short,Live it long
author: Zaveric

quote: Life—the way it really is—is a battle not between good and bad, but between bad and worse
author: Joseph Brodsky
